Hutt South MP Chris Bishop’s electoral office damaged in Wellington storm https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hutt-south-mp-chris-bishops-electoral-office-damaging-in-wellington-storm/HYK2WBBX6RB4LKNMKQWHFFQMGU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hutt-south-mp-chris-bishops-electoral-office-damaging-in-wellington-storm/HYK2WBBX6RB4LKNMKQWHFFQMGU/ Benjamin PlummerBishop took to Twitter to revel the new look of his damaged office. Tue, 12 Dec 2023 09:09:25 +0000 The roof of Hutt South MP Chris Bishop’s electoral office collapsed amid a severe thunderstorm in Wellington this afternoon as torrents of rain, large hail and surface flooding caused widespread damage. Photo / Twitter

Why Riccarton High School cricket coach David Biddick refused a funeral - and what his family are doing instead https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/why-riccarton-high-school-cricket-coach-david-biddick-refused-a-funeral-and-what-his-family-are-doing-instead/ 73R77FCYMFDRXLOHLU3H3CKV3E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/why-riccarton-high-school-cricket-coach-david-biddick-refused-a-funeral-and-what-his-family-are-doing-instead/ 73R77FCYMFDRXLOHLU3H3CKV3E/ Nicholas JonesDavid Biddick died of brain cancer on November 30. This is his extraordinary legacy. Tue, 12 Dec 2023 06:59:54 +0000 David Biddick, who died of brain cancer on November 30, with his wife Elizabeth Biddick and grandchildren Ava Koster and Noah Koster. He was a beloved coach and sports co-ordinator at Riccarton High School in Christchurch.
